text: if you're a professional photographer or
want to be you don't buy a camera like
this you buy a full-frame professional
camera like this it's called full-frame
because the light sensor inside is the
size of a full piece of old film get
incredible low-light performance
beautiful color the sensor inside this
camera is only about this big
of course what the world has always
wanted is a compact camera with a
full-frame sensor inside well for the
first time in history Sony has done that
it's the RX one it takes incredible
pictures look at that gorgeous defocused
background and as for low-light compare
regular camera and the RX Flint
unfortunately the price is steep $2,800
and it doesn't zoom and the lens is
fixed it doesn't interchange lenses but
nobody ever thought a compact full-frame
camera was even possible so in a way the
Sony rx1 isn't just a camera it's a
milestone
